            Mayor and Council

            Mayor and Council

            Mayor's Message

            On behalf of the City of Palacios, I am delighted to extend a warm welcome to you! 

            Whether you are here for a short visit or a longer stay, you will find plenty to enjoy and explore. Our city offers a variety of attractions and activities, from leisurely strolls along our scenic bayside boardwalk to the exciting water sports and fishing opportunities that our coastal location provides. Don't miss the chance to visit our local museum, unique shops, and delightful restaurants that offer regional cuisine.

            Palacios is not just a place to visit; it's a place to experience. Our community prides itself on its hospitality and welcoming spirit. Take a moment to engage with our residents, who are always eager to share stories about our town's heritage and offer recommendations for hidden gems to explore.

            As you enjoy all that Palacios has to offer, please know that our city staff and I are here to assist you in any way we can. If you have any questions or need help, please don't hesitate to reach out to city offices.

            Thank you for choosing to visit Palacios. We hope that your time here is filled with memorable moments and that you leave with a sense of the warmth and beauty that makes our city special. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

            Warm regards,

            Rick Cink
            Mayor of Palacios, Texas

            City Council Meetings

            Palacios City Council holds its regular meetings on the second (2nd) and fourth (4th) Thursdays of each month. Regular meetings begin at 6:00 p.m. and are held in Council Chambers 311 Henderson; Palacios, TX 77465. Special meetings and workshops are sometimes planned and generally begin at 6:00 p.m. Agendas are posted at least 72 hours prior to any meeting.

            City Hall: 361-972-3605
            311 Henderson
            Palacios, TX 77465

            To be placed on an agenda please contact City Hall one week before the meeting requested.
